title: Topic 001 Question 123
body: A company’s customers are reporting increased latency while accessing static web content from Amazon S3. A SysOps administrator observed a very high rate of read operations on a particular S3 bucket.
What will minimize latency by reducing load on the S3 bucket?
options: Migrate the S3 bucket to a region that is closer to end users’ geographic locations.
Use cross-region replication to replicate all of the data to another region.
Create an Amazon CloudFront distribution with the S3 bucket as the origin.
Use Amazon ElastiCache to cache data being served from Amazon S3.
